meaningMnemonic: You see a <radical>triceratops</radical> in the distance. But, it's odd. It's perfectly <radical>pi</radical> shaped (that is, circular). Some kind of piceratops, if you will. The reason they are this shape is because they want to absorb as much <kanji>sunlight</kanji> (or just <kanji>light</kanji> is fine, too) as possible. They evolved to be round so they don't have any corners casting a shadow.
readingMnemonic: As you watch this majestic beast absorbing <kanji>sunlight</kanji>, suddenly several dozen feral (<reading>こう</reading>いち)s burst from various hiding spots, spears in hand. Oh no! Those こういちs are hunting this rare piceratops!
